project.description: This project used to publish test opengauss website;【2021-12-06】

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
ARGOCD_PROJECT_NAME="opengauss-test-website"
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker is not installed." fi
echo "###### build starting ######"
time=`date "+%Y%m%d%H%M%S"` build_version="v1.0.$time"
echo "build version: $build_version"
website_imageId=""
project_name=test_opengauss_website echo "###################################### build $project_name：$build_version ######################################" cd "$WORKSPACE/test_opengauss_website" docker build -t ${project_name}:${build_version} . website_imageId=$(docker images | grep ${project_name} | grep ${build_version} | awk '{print $3}') #sh /var/jenkins_home/swr_upload.sh opengauss ${project_name}:${build_version}
docker tag ${project_name}:${build_version} swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/opengauss/test_opengauss_website:$build_version
docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/opengauss/test_opengauss_website:$build_version
if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "push image succcess" else echo "push image fail" exit 1 fi
docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/opengauss/test_opengauss_website:$build_version
if [ -d "infra-common" ]; then rm -rf "infra-common" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-common cd infra-common/common-applications/test-environment/opengauss-website-test else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/opengauss/test_opengauss_website:$build_version else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update opengauss-website-test image to opengauss-website-test:$build_version" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print$4}'`>/dev/null curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${ARGOCD_PROJECT_NAME}/sync">/dev/null if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "complete!" else echo "failed!" fi
